name: Atooms to Moolecules Demo
description: Atooms to Moolecules is a chemistry based puzzle game. In this game you are in a Chemistry lab, your task is to solve different puzzles. You can arrange atoms to make ring, linear, small or big molecules and have fun with them. The game is played in different lab equipment.
minimum_requirements: OS: WindowsMemory: 128 MBHard Disk Space: 32 MB
